# write to Google Spreadsheet
```{r}
sheet_write(
  df_series,
  ss = ss_output,
  sheet = "series_global"
  )
sheet_write(
  df, 
  ss = ss_output,
  sheet = "cards"
  )
sheet_write(
  df |> filter(is_pokemon), 
  ss = ss_output,
  sheet = "cards: pokemon"
  )
sheet_write(
  release_dates_df2, 
  ss = ss_output,
  sheet = "releases"
  )
```
